author: DryRun
body:
Backports https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18353 to 9_0_2 for online DQM. 

For correcting the number of samples in HF TP emulation, I merged the following:
- 8783cd36da6eaddb55476524183f53e7f9cfbd5f from https://github.com/christopheralanwest/cmssw/commits/correct_hcal_presamples_90X, 
- #18170
- #17882

I also changed the adc2fC conversion to use the DB values as in normal reconstruction, rather than a hard-coded lookup table.

These additional two items will be incorporated into the next PR to 9_1_X (coordinate with the TP nsamples PRs).

@christopheralanwest
title: Backport #18353 to 90X, plus update TP nsamples and adc2fC
